short-title.#text:
Achieving a Better Life Experience Act
			 of 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

The purposes of this Act are as
			 follows:

To encourage and
			 assist individuals and families in saving private funds for the purpose of
			 supporting individuals with disabilities to maintain health, independence, and
			 quality of life.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the supplemental security income program under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: title XIX of the Social Security Act

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , the beneficiary’s employment, and other sources.

The following expenses shall be qualified disability

				disability:

has a medically

is blind.

				claimed as qualified disability
				expenses.

current-chamber.#text: IN THE SENATE OF THE UNITED STATES

official-title.#text:
To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide for
		  the tax treatment of ABLE accounts established under State programs for the
		  care of family members with disabilities, and for other
		  purposes.
